physical_appearance: The image shows an exposure table. It has a rectangular bottom and a semicircular shaped top. There are Chinese characters all over . There are also a number of pictures containing drawings. These drawings show scenes of places, as well as people. There are also a number of pictures that depict the proper ways to take photographs. There are numbers all over as well.
